text:
Hi HS devs, can anyone tell me why this regex wouldn't remove full stops and normal brackets, ie . ( and )?

`|regex_replace("/[^A-Z0-9]/gi", "")`

brilliant, thanks Byron, that does the trick!

I haven't quite gotten my head around using + in regex, but this works perfectly :grin:

I'm using a HubSpot workflow that is connected to a form on a website page but want to dynamically change the content based on the form fill. Does anyone if it's actually possible? I did a simple `console.log`  on the custom action code but it didn't log... I assume because the workflow isn't directly connected :thinking_face:
